pullRequest.body:
Move everything that can't be additivised out of `Algebra.Group.Pi.Lemmas`:
* `MulZeroClass`, `MulZeroOneClass`, etc... instances go to a new `Algebra.GroupWithZero.Pi` file. I credit Eric W. for https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib/pull/4766.
* `AddMonoidWithOne`, `AddGroupWithOne` instances go to `Algebra.Ring.Pi`.

---

GitHub will format the text above it as a title.

(that is, before the `---`) using the following format:

Co-authored-by: Author Name <author@email.com>

Any other comments you want to keep out of the PR commit should go
below the `---`, and placed outside this HTML comment, or else they
will be invisible to reviewers.

using the following format:

- [ ] depends on: #xyz [optional extra text]
-->

nodes.body: Can you split the `mulSingle` rename to a separate PR?

:v: YaelDillies can now approve this pull request. To approve and merge a pull request, simply reply with `bors r+`. More detailed instructions are available [here](https://bors.tech/documentation/getting-started/#reviewing-pull-requests).

Pull request successfully merged into master.

  * [Check all files imported](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/8875216859/job/24364188359)
  * [Lint style](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/8875216859/job/24364189297)

Looks good to me otherwise!

bors d+

Looks good to me otherwise!

bors d+
No idea why this was needed

```suggestion
instance mulZeroClass : MulZeroClass (â i, Î± i) where
  zero_mul := by intros; ext; exact zero_mul _
  mul_zero := by intros; ext; exact mul_zero _
```
Why did you rename this? Doesn't this name match `AddMonoidHom.single`?

My reasoning was that it's better to have `Pi.single` somewhere in the name, and also it fits with the other declarations in the `Pi` namespace. But yes I see that it has many friends which I haven't renamed.

Thoughts?
Since there's a defensible argument to not do this change, let's postpone it to a separate PR that renames all the `single`s at once. I much prefer PRs that try to do as little as possible.

pullRequest.title: [Merged by Bors] - chore: Move monoid with zero instances on pi types
